title: IN THE VALLEY OF ELAH
description:
A career officer (Jones) and his wife (Sarandon) work with a police detective (Theron) to uncover the truth behind their son&#039;s disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq


Tommy Lee Jones ...  Hank Deerfield 

 Charlize Theron ...  Det. Emily Sanders 

 Jason Patric ...  Lt. Kirklander 

 Susan Sarandon ...  Joan Deerfield 

 James Franco ...  Sgt. Dan Carnelli 

 Barry Corbin ...  Arnold Bickman 
 Josh Brolin ...  Chief Buchwald 

 Frances Fisher ...  Evie 

 Nominated for Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations
